title: Aqua Bless
description:
A collection of stories:

1. Telepa Sweet
Mari Kyunko has a very special kind of telepathy: She receives the sensual input of people, who have sex in her vicinity. But her talent is out of control, bringing her to her knees--until a concerned boy tries to help her. Has she found the right boy at last?

2. Travel And Love-Ru
Shunsuke Oota wins a vacation for two and brings his girlfriend Yura Akane with him. But Yura is crazy with frustration--Shunsuke won't even touch her! Is this her big chance?

3. Cow Girl
Hiromi is Shinohara's neighbor and a member of a music band of scantily clad cow girls. One day, he catches Hiromi masturbating and accidently takes a photo of it. What will happen with the photo or them?

4-5. Twins
Misaki has eyes for Tazuna, Katsumi has eyes for him. Both girls are identical twins and Katsumi tries to exploit this--by pretending to be Tazuna!

6. Demon Squadron Matenger
Arisaka's sempai is a superhero stage performer, and she dreams of being able to act with him onstage. Then he asks her to play Empress Rubia--in a very skimpy outfit. Will it go well? Will her sempai notice her?

7. Train Woman
Koaru Otobe was felt up by a old pedo geezer on a train. But some girls made a photo of this, got money from the pervert, made Otobe wear a skirt and threatened to blackmail him via photos, too! How much more of this will Otobe take?

8. Lady Impact!
Reiko Hishii arrives (in a helicopter) to save Diago Watanabe from the school bullies... And to shanghai him into marrying her!

9. Winter Memory
Megumi got ditched by her ex-classmates in a graduation trip, but she soon finds someone else at the ski resort to spend time with...

10. Telepha Sweet 1.5
The two lovebirds are still disturbed by telepathic input of people having sex (cameos of all the other characters in the volume) and find no place where there aren't people having sex nearby!

Link:
[url=https://www.doujinshi.org/book/5929/Aqua-Bless/]The Doujinshi & Manga Lexicon[/url]

matches.title: This Astolfo will be able to ejaculate in 100 days
